title: Dazzling Diamond Vanki - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold with meticulously set Brilliant Cut Diamonds. VVS Clarity and E-F Color Diamonds enhance the brilliance. Features Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This contemporary Vanki design reimagines a classic South Indian bangle. Features three rows of dazzling diamonds, interspersed with floral diamond clusters. The openable design ensures ease of wear and a comfortable fit. The intricate setting maximizes the sparkle of each individual diamond.
colors: Predominantly golden yellow from the 18k gold
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Can also be styled for modern Indian or Western attire.
description: A modern interpretation of a classic design. The high-quality diamonds and superior craftsmanship ensure a timeless piece that can be treasured for generations. The openable design makes it easy to wear and remove. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of sophistication.
